text: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
author: African Proverb
context: This proverb emphasizes the importance of community and collaboration in achieving long-term success.

author: Ubuntu Philosophy
context: The Ubuntu philosophy emphasizes the interconnectedness of all people and the importance of community.

text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela
context: Spoken in recognition of the transformative power of education in creating a just society.
